General.Name: Tengjun Biotechnology Corp
General.Description: Tengjun Biotechnology Corp., through its subsidiaries, engages in producing, packaging, distributing, and marketing featured dandelion teas and water purifiers in the People's Republic of China. It offers black and green dandelion teas; and household water purifiers. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Jining, China.
General.Address: East Jinze Road and South Huimin Road, Jining, China

AddressData.Street: East Jinze Road and South Huimin Road
